description: The **activity indicator** provides clear visual feedback to the user that the system is working on a request in addition to the current status or activity made on the task of determinate duration.
name: Activity Indicator
usage:
The Linear Bar is the first of two options for the Activity Indicator. The Circular alternative is the second option for the Activity Indicator. ##### Linear bar indicator ```html
